title: GraphQL vs. OpenAPI: Pros and Cons for Data Governance
author: Ken Stott
description: A Fortune 50 CTO evaluates the pros and cons of OpenAPI and GraphQL API standards, and their relevance to data governance.
cntitle: GraphQL 与 OpenAPI：数据治理的优缺点
cndescription: 一位财富 50 强公司的 CTO 评估了 OpenAPI 和 GraphQL API 标准的优缺点，以及它们与数据治理的相关性。
